page.title: 18WEST HULL FIRE STATION
page.content: THIS FIRE STATION ALSO COVERS A LARGE AREA TO THE WEST OF HULL. THE STATION HAS TWO PUMPING APPLIANCES, A RESCUE TENDER FOR MOTORWAY ACCIDENTS, AND A HYDRAULIC PLATFORM WHICH CAN REACH 22.5 METRES. IN I984 THE STATION ATTENDED 1110 INCIDENTS WHICH INCLUDED, CHEMICAL HAZARDS, HOUSE FIRES AND ROAD TRAFFIC ACCIDENTS. THE RESPONSE TIME AVERAGES 5 MINUTES. THE FIREMEN TRAIN DAILY AND HAVE LECTURES ON SPECIAL INCIDENTS. EG. TRAIN CRASHES. THEY MAKE USE OF A COMPUTER TO STORE INFORMATION ON SPECIALISED RISKS, FACTORIES AND HOSPITALS. THE LATEST PIECE OF EQUIPMENT IS THE THERMAL CAMERA TO LOCATE TRAPPED PEOPLE IN THICK SMOKE OR UNDER RUBBLE.
